definitions.title: adv.
definitions.body: then, thereupon (so Eg. Aram. S-C Pap. H 1, J 1), not Targum: the usu. Aram. forms are [[הֵידֵין]] hodeyn, Mand. [[האידין]] (Nö:M 207); from [[[אֱדַי]]] = BH [[אֲזַי]] (v.[[אָז]]) + determ. affix n (as in [[דִּכֵּן]], [[תַּמָּן]]; in Sab. = post-pos. art.; Hom:Chr. § 57: cf. W:CG 115), Nö:GGA 1884, 1020: [[אֲזַי]], [[[אֱדַי]]], prob. from same demonstr. √ as [[זֶה]], [[דָּא]], [[דִּי]], etc., 0’id-o, 0’id-a0, lo 0’id-an0 well then, in that case, Eth. m40ze:: when? y40ze:: now (Di:Lex. 197, 1072), Syr. deyn (enclitic) but);—then, thereupon, Da 2:15, Da 2:17, Da 2:19, Da 2:25, Da 2:48, Da 3:24 +, Ezr 4:9, Ezr 4:23, Ezr 5:4, Ezr 5:9 + (alw., exc. Ezr 5:5, at beg. of sentence, introducing new stage of narrative with some emph.); so c. [[בְּ]], [[בֵּאדַיִן]] (3 t. Ezr., 26 t. Dn) Da 2:14, Da 2:35, Da 2:46, Da 3:3, Da 3:13, Da 3:19, Da 3:21, Da 3:21, Da 3:26, etc., Ezr 4:24, Ezr 5:2, Ezr 6:1; [[מִן־אֱדַיִן]] from that time † Ezr 5:16.
